dct_title_s: A new & accurate map of the North Pole, with all the countries hitherto discovered situated near or adjacent to it as well as some others more remote : drawn from the latest and best authorities and regulated by astronom[ica]l observat[io]ns
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Includes descriptive notes and ornamental cartouche. "Meridian of London." Scale determined by using graticule method. In lower margin: No. 110. From: A complete system of geography ... / by Emanuel Bowen ... London : Printed for William Innys, Richard Ware, Aaron Ward [and 13 others], 1747.
dct_publisher_sm: [London : Printed for William Innys, Richard Ware, Aaron Ward [and 13 others], 1747]
